title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese (Pecorino Romano), pancetta, and black pepper. It's creamy, comforting, and full of flavor.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs and cheese together, then season with black pepper.
Combine pasta with pancetta, then mix in the egg mixture.
Toss until creamy and serve with extra cheese.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth, buttery, and creamy tomato-based gravy with aromatic spices. A popular Indian dish.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, spices, and salt for at least an hour.
Grill chicken or cook in a pan until fully cooked.
Fry onions, add tomatoes and spices, then cook for a few minutes.
Add chicken, butter, and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
summary: A vibrant mix of vegetables like bell peppers, carrots, and broccoli stir-fried in a savory sauce made with soy sauce, garlic, and ginger.
instructions: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a pan, add garlic and ginger, sauté for 1 minute.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Pour in soy sauce and season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

title: Beef Stew
summary: A hearty and comforting stew made with tender beef chunks, carrots, potatoes, and onions, simmered in a rich broth for a deep, savory flavor.
instructions: Brown beef chunks in a pot, then set aside.
Sauté onions, carrots, and potatoes until softened.
Add beef back to the pot with broth, thyme, and bay leaves.
Simmer for 2 hours until beef is tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A classic salad made with crispy romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing. Perfect as a side or main dish.
instructions: Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Top with croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Serve immediately.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy and soft pancakes made from flour, eggs, milk, and a bit of baking powder, served with syrup, butter, and fresh fruit.
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in a bowl.
Whisk in the egg and milk to form a batter.
Cook pancakes in a heated buttered pan until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
Serve with syrup and fruit.

title: Fish Tacos
summary: Crispy fried fish fillets wrapped in soft tortillas, topped with fresh cabbage slaw, avocado, and a tangy lime crema.
instructions: Fry fish fillets until crispy.
Mix sour cream with lime juice and season with salt.
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage slaw, avocado, and lime crema.
Serve immediately.

title: Chilli Chicken
summary: A spicy, tangy, and flavorful dish made with chicken, bell peppers, onions, and a combination of chili sauce and soy sauce.
instructions: Stir-fry chicken with ginger and garlic.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for a few more minutes.
Pour in chili sauce and soy sauce, cook for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice.

title: Vegetarian Pizza
summary: A pizza topped with a variety of fresh vegetables like mushrooms, onions, peppers, and olives, with mozzarella and marinara sauce.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C.
Roll out pizza dough and spread marinara sauce.
Top with mozzarella and vegetables.
Bake for 15-20 minutes or until golden.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: A rich and decadent chocolate cake with layers of creamy chocolate frosting, perfect for any celebration.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix dry ingredients, then add wet ingredients.
Pour batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30 minutes, then cool before frosting.
